div.h2: Engineering Program Manager, Hardware Technologies Exploratory Design

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: In this critical, highly visible role, you will manage programs involving architecture scoping, prototyping, design, integration and validation of cutting-edge technologies for Health platform. You will play a key part in providing Apple customers with the best user-experience in the industry by driving the development and deployment of next-generation technologies spanning cross-functional teams of Technology, Module, SW, and System. The Hardware Technologies team features a collaborative environment with creative, smart people and cutting-edge technologies. Engineering excellence is expected and encouraged.

ul.li: Typically requires 5-10+ years of technical experience, and at least 1+ years of program management experience. Individuals with more experience, can take on additional responsibilities.
Technical background (e.g. semiconductor materials, silicon photonics, optics, EE, etc) with first-hand knowledge of any of cross-functional core competencies
Excellent communication, organizational and leadership skills
Ability to filter and distill relevant information for the right audience and is data driven
Self-motivated and proactive with demonstrated creative and critical thinking capabilities
Great leadership skills and ability to inspire team members
Understands and deals well with rapid development cycles; remains flexible and calm in the face of uncertainty
Teamwork: the candidate must be able to fit in well with a team, understand capabilities and priorities while fostering a collaborative environment
Limited international travel may be required

div.p: •Lead cross-functional teams including Electrical, Process and Software Engineering to deliver state-of-the-art solutions •Define the program plan/schedule and manage program execution •Deliver executive communication/presentations and drive the decision-making process •Ensure tight inter-team coordination and communication •Effectively and consistently communicate overall program status •Identify and resolve conflicts, inter-dependencies and program issues quickly and efficiently •Improve the system: Look for patterns, offer best practices and implement change
MS or BS Degree in technical discipline
